page.title: 16Mansion House Dalgety Bay.
page.content: There are now no plans for the development of Donibristle House. People in the area think something ought to be done with it. Some children suggested that the remains of Donibristle House should be converted into an old world inn called the "Earl's Inn". Downstairs there would be a bar serving real Scottish ale as well as spirits and upstairs a restaurant which would serve traditional Scottish dishes. The decor would have to create an atmosphere of the mid nineteenth century. The bedrooms would contain modern furniture and a television and video. A small area would be set aside for a heated indoor swimming pool which could be used by the people of Dalgety Bay. Another suggestion was to make the house into a wax works museum portraying scenes from the past.
